metadata.description: Collection of AI agent skills for AWS querying (Athena, CloudWatch), Anki flashcard management, audio conversion, and safe terminal command registration

plugins.name: convert-audio
plugins.description: Convert audio files between formats using ffmpeg. Use when converting audio formats (MP3, WAV, AAC, FLAC, Opus, OGG), adjusting bitrate/quality, changing sample rate/channels, or modifying playback speed.

plugins.name: manage-anki-flashcards
plugins.description: This skill should be used when working with Anki flashcard software through the AnkiConnect API. Use for creating flashcards, managing decks, searching notes/cards, syncing collections, controlling review sessions, or any Anki automation tasks.

plugins.name: query-aws-athena
plugins.description: This skill should be used when working with AWS Athena queries or CloudWatch Log Insights, including executing queries, downloading results, optimizing query performance, monitoring query progress, or structuring complex queries. Use when querying data in Athena, analyzing CloudWatch logs, investigating errors or patterns, handling large result sets, or generating reports.

plugins.name: query-cloudwatch-logs
plugins.description: This skill should be used when working with AWS Athena queries or CloudWatch Log Insights, including executing queries, downloading results, optimizing query performance, monitoring query progress, or structuring complex queries. Use when querying data in Athena, analyzing CloudWatch logs, investigating errors or patterns, handling large result sets, or generating reports.

plugins.name: register-safe-terminal-commands
plugins.description: This skill should be used when registering or syncing safe terminal commands to Claude Code settings. Use when the user wants to configure which bash commands Claude Code can execute without requiring approval, or when they need to register/update their safe commands list from the reference file.
